text: "Lonely Street" is a 1959 song by Andy Wiliams and is the title track to fifth studio album Lonely Street. It was written by Carl Belew and Kenny Sowder. It has been covered by a number of artists since its release. ==References== Category:1959 songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Kitty Wells songs Category:Patsy Cline songs Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:Ray Price (musician) songs Category:George Jones songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Emmylou Harris songs
title: Lonely Street (Carl Belew song)
